description: This source file initializes and configures a Vue.js front-end application, importing necessary modules, creating the app instance, applying plugins (Pinia for state management and Vue Router for routing), and mounting the app to the DOM.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Creates a new Vue application instance with the root component 'App'.

methods.name: createPinia
methods.description: Creates a Pinia store instance for state management.

methods.name: app.use
methods.description: Registers plugins (Pinia and router) with the Vue application.

methods.name: app.mount
methods.description: Mounts the Vue application to the DOM element with id 'app'.
